update.releaseNotes: - FIXES: Invite link and QR code crashing - FIXES: Frequent, multiple friend requests - ADDED: Ability to migrate to new server even when you existing server is offline (Dukgo XMPP ends today!) - URGENT: Migration Assistant: Move from Dukgo to Zom.im servers! - NEW: Beta support for enhanced message privacy (OMEMO!) - Many more updates, fixes, and stability improvements
